I am a PhD student working at LIX under the supervision of Laurent Bulteau (LIGM) and Yann Ponty (LIX).

I focus on designing parameterized algorithms for hard problems in RNA bioinformatics, with a particular emphasis on graph width parameters such as treewidth.

My research interests more largely include graph theory, graph algorithms, general bioinformatics and quantum computing (see CV).
